posts.post_content:
**SOLD IN RECORD TIME***

Have a few dupes available from one of the Bean town lots. Take all 5 for $100 bucks delivered. Drop me a pm or email if you like em'. 
Let's call em good + as a group. Paypal A-Okay with no extra fee. Thanks all, Tony
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

Doolan batting - crease runs side to side neck high
Dygert -light surface cracking collar level
Williams - measures slightly short but I don't detect any trimming / scratching on back in the word Piedmont
Fiene - bottom left corner crease
Downey fielding - crease runs side to side elbow high / front staining
